content:
Hi all - We have setup a Doodle Poll for our next meeting re: FHIR to OMOP Oncology alignment. If interested, please fill out this Doodle Poll and add your preference for a date/time by Thursday, Nov 11: https://doodle.com/poll/d577kwwtk3wyapxs/

I will then choose what the majority decides and post the invite and Teams details to this thread by the end of this week. Thanks!
May Terry has marked this topic as resolved.

Just a quick reminder that our next FHIR+OMOP Oncology meeting is on December 2, 2021 at 12p ET.
The meeting invite is here: https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_MGVhOTJkNTctMWNkMS00MDQ1LTg5YzItNmMyZWMzYTAwZTIy%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%22c620dc48-1d50-4952-8b39-df4d54d74d82%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%22912e5167-1db2-4628-b366-47b76d2062f8%22%7d
Join us as we further push the envelope in standardizing the exchange cancer data between our communities! :smile:
May Terry has marked this topic as unresolved.
